participant_1.background:
I love to swim in the lake, even if it makes me a weirdo.
I'm scared that my child will never be able to live a normal life.
i like to cook new recipes.
I ride my moped with the wind in my hair and music in my ears.
I remember feeling safe and loved in my childhood home.

participant_2.background:
I try to go out for a walk or do something to take my mind off things.
I'm not a weather person.
i also eat too much french fries.
i am currently studying at union college and want to be an english teacher.
I am an aspiring male model while my mother looks after my grandmother.

content.text: Hi there! How are you doing today?
I'm doing pretty good, thanks for asking. How about you?
I'm doing well, too. I'm just about to go swimming in the lake.
Oh, that sounds fun! I love swimming.
Me too! I'm not sure if it's weird, but I love swimming in the lake, even if it's cold.
Not weird at all! I love swimming in the ocean, even if it's cold.
I'm glad I'm not the only one. What do you like to do when you're not swimming?
I like to go out for walks, read books, and cook new recipes.
Me too! I love to cook new recipes, especially when I can share them with friends and family.
That sounds really nice. I'm sure your friends and family love your cooking.
Thanks, they do! I'm glad we're both such foodies.
Me too! I think we would get along great.
